sentences.en: Among cotyledon , petiole of cotyledon, hypocotyl, and radicle, hypocotyl has the most responsive explants to 2, 4 - D .
sentences.cn: 在子叶 、 叶柄 、 胚轴以及胚根四者当中, 下胚轴对2, 4-D 的反应状况最好.

sentences.en: Dark green and glossy leaf, thick and white petiole, good plant shape, heat tolerance, good quality.
sentences.cn: 叶色深绿、叶柄洁白且宽厚 、 外型美观 、 耐热 、 品质佳.

sentences.en: Green or brown flexible petiole, variable internode length. Large trailer.
sentences.cn: 绿色或咖啡色的柔软叶柄, 节间距离易变. 大的悬垂型.

sentences.en: In long shoot, the leaf width, leaf length, leaf area, petiole length and basal angle decreased, but the leaf index and the ratio of lobation increased as its arrangement increased.
sentences.cn: 一年生长枝叶片的叶宽、叶长、叶面积、叶柄长、叶基角均随叶序的增加逐渐减小，叶形指数和有缺刻叶的比例则增加。

sentences.en: Late - bolting, white petiole good plant shape, good quality.
sentences.cn: 晚抽薹 、 叶柄洁白、植株紧凑 、 品质佳.

sentences.en: Light green, elliptical, very thin, long flexible petiole. Usually single crown. Large.
sentences.cn: 亮绿色椭圆型很薄的叶子, 长而有弹性的叶柄. 通常单个顶芽. 大型.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo determine the total alkaloid and berberine contents in and petiole organs from Coptis omeiensis.
sentences.cn: 目的确定峨眉野连不同器官的总生物碱和小檗碱含量.

sentences.en: Olive or petiole and cauline stalk are Brown.
sentences.cn: 叶柄及茎秆黄绿色或褐色.

sentences.en: On one - year - old tawny sticks, with oval - shaped Pikong, especially near the petiole more.
sentences.cn: 一年生枝浅黄褐色, 具椭圆形皮孔, 尤以叶柄附近为多.

sentences.en: ResultsRhizome, fibre, lamina and petiole organs obtain alkaloid and berberine contents.
sentences.cn: 结果峨眉野连根茎 、 须根 、 叶片和叶柄中,均含有生物碱和小檗碱.

sentences.en: Rich bottom shape , good quality, glossy green leaf, thick wider petiole.
sentences.cn: 束腰、美观, 品质优, 叶色油绿,叶柄宽厚.

sentences.en: Stipule A modified leaf found as an outgrowth from the petiole or leaf base.
sentences.cn: 托叶:由叶柄或叶基部生长出的变态的叶,为发育产生的外部结构.

sentences.en: The basic medium, choice of node petiole explants, plant growth regulator concentration and variety all affected the induction of somatic embryos and the regeneration of adventitious buds.
sentences.cn: 结果表明，体胚的诱导和不定芽的再生与基本培养基、叶柄的着生部位、生长调节物质种类和浓度等因素有关。

sentences.en: The content of metal elements in a leaf is higher than in a petiole.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜中重金属元素含量,叶片要显著超过叶柄.

sentences.en: The vascular tissue passes through the pulvinus into the petiole proper.
sentences.cn: 维管组织经过叶枕进入叶柄.

sentences.en: Whereas the most difference among quantity characters are lobule petiole length and beta coefficient is 70.03 %.
sentences.cn: 各数量性状亦存在较大变异,其中小叶柄长度变异较大,变异系数达70.03%.

sentences.en: Wider, white and mid - length petiole, green leaf, heat tolerance , resistant to diseases.
sentences.cn: 中脚紧凑 、 叶色绿, 叶柄宽白,耐热 、 抗病.

trans.tran_en: the stalk by which a leaf is attached to the rest of the plant
